document.full_text: the recent disclosure by the federal judge who struck down the ban on same-sex marriage that he is in a long-term relationship with another man has given sponsors of the ban new grounds to appeal.
document.title: west: california: marriage ban's backers raise issue of judge's relationship
lines_and_colors: the recent disclosure by the federal judge who struck down the ban on same-sex marriage that he is in a long-term relationship with another man has given sponsors of the ban new grounds to appeal.
